ComicInfo.Title: Cobra Civil War Part 13
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Joes go underground—literally! They’ve been on the defensive for the last four months, and now they’ve got a plan to get out of the line of fire, regroup, and start painting Cobra with red, white, and blue butt-kicking! That is, if Cobra doesn’t find them and kill them first... Zartan and Baroness are scheming, and that can’t be good for the Joes!
*Notes:* The third Variant Cover is a homage of the cover of The X-Men #141.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 17:10:09. [CVDB294195]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Shearer, Chris Ivy, Javier Saltares, Ron Adrian
ComicInfo.Inker: Brian Shearer, Chris Ivy, Javier Saltares, Ron Adrian
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Beachhead, Flint, Hard Drive, Krake, Roadblock, Sneak Peek, Tripwire, Zartan
